name: Cosmic Assault: Endless Space Shooter
description: Cosmic Assault is an action-packed endless space shooter game that will have you on the edge of your seat. You are a brave pilot who must face off against enemy spaceships, dodging their attacks while shooting them down to earn points. With two different enemy types and power-ups like health boosts and double laser boosts, each wave of enemies will bring new challenges. As you progress, the enemies will get stronger, but so will you. With the promise of even more enemy types and power-ups to come, Cosmic Assault is an endless adventure that you won't want to miss. So strap in, blast off, and get ready for a cosmic battle unlike any other.
